verses.verse: But now thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H3290>you,<s%> Jacob, and he who <S%H3335>formed<s%> <S%H3478>you,<s%> Israel: <S%H3372>"Don't<s%> be afraid, for I have <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> <S%H7121>you.<s%> I have called you by your <S%H8034>name.<s%> You are mine.

When you pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> I will be with <S%H5674>you;<s%> and through the <S%H5104>rivers,<s%> they will not <S%H7857>overflow<s%> <S%H3212>you.<s%> When you walk <S%H1119>through<s%> the <S%H784>fire,<s%> you will not be <S%H3554>burned,<s%> and flame will not scorch <S%H3852>you.<s%>

For I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> your <S%H3467>Savior.<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> as your <S%H3724>ransom,<s%> <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> and Seba in your <S%H5434>place.<s%>

Since you have been <S%H3365>precious<s%> and <S%H3513>honored<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight,<s%> and I have <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H5414>you;<s%> therefore I will give <S%H120>people<s%> in your <S%H3816>place,<s%> and nations instead of your <S%H5315>life.<s%>
<S%H3372>Don't<s%> be afraid; for I am with <S%H935>you.<s%> I will bring your <S%H2233>seed<s%> from the <S%H4217>east,<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> you from the <S%H4628>west.<s%>

I will <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H6828>north,<s%> <S%H5414><s%> 'Give them up!' and tell the <S%H8486>south,<s%> <S%H3607><s%> 'Don't hold them back! <S%H935>Bring<s%> my <S%H1121>sons<s%> from <S%H7350>far,<s%> and my <S%H1323>daughters<s%> from the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>â€”

<S%H3605>everyone<s%> who is <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name,<s%> and whom I have <S%H1254>created<s%> for my <S%H3519>glory,<s%> whom I have <S%H3335>formed,<s%> <S%H6213>yes,<s%> whom I have made.'"
Bring <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H5787>blind<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H3426>have<s%> <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and the <S%H2795>deaf<s%> who have <S%H241>ears.<s%>

Let all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> be <S%H6908>gathered<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> and let the <S%H3816>peoples<s%> be <S%H622>assembled.<s%> Who among them can <S%H5046>declare<s%> <S%H8085>this,<s%> and show us former <S%H7223>things?<s%> Let them <S%H5414>bring<s%> their <S%H5707>witnesses,<s%> that they may be <S%H6663>justified;<s%> or let them <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> "That is <S%H571>true.<s%>"

"You are my <S%H5707>witnesses,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "With my <S%H5650>servant<s%> whom I have <S%H977>chosen;<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> and <S%H539>believe<s%> <S%H995>me,<s%> and understand that I am <S%H6440>he.<s%> Before me there was no <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H3335>formed,<s%> neither will there be after <S%H310>me.<s%>
I myself am <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and <S%H1107>besides<s%> me there is no <S%H3467>savior.<s%>

I have <S%H5046>declared,<s%> I have <S%H3467>saved,<s%> and I have <S%H8085>shown;<s%> and there was no <S%H2114>strange<s%> god among <S%H5707>you.<s%> Therefore you are my witnesses," <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "and I am <S%H410>God.<s%>
<S%H3117>Yes,<s%> since the day was I am <S%H5337>he;<s%> and there is no one who can deliver out of my <S%H3027>hand.<s%> I will <S%H6466>work,<s%> and who can hinder <S%H7725>it?<s%>"

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> your <S%H1350>Redeemer,<s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> "For your <S%H7971>sake,<s%> I have sent to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and I will bring all of <S%H1281>them<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> as <S%H3778>fugitives,<s%> even the Chaldeans, in the <S%H591>ships<s%> of their <S%H7440>rejoicing.<s%>
I am <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> your Holy <S%H6918>One,<s%> the <S%H1254>Creator<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> your <S%H4428>King.<s%>"
Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who <S%H5414>makes<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%> in the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and a <S%H5410>path<s%> in the <S%H5794>mighty<s%> <S%H4325>waters;<s%>

who brings <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> and <S%H5483>horse,<s%> the <S%H2428>army<s%> and the <S%H5808>mighty<s%> <S%H7901>man<s%> (they lie down <S%H3162>together,<s%> they shall not <S%H6965>rise;<s%> they are <S%H1846>extinct,<s%> they are <S%H3518>quenched<s%> like a <S%H6594>wick<s%>):
<S%H2142>"Don't<s%> remember the former <S%H7223>things,<s%> and <S%H995>don't<s%> consider the things of <S%H6931>old.<s%>

<S%H6213>Behold,<s%> I will do a new <S%H2319>thing.<s%> It springs <S%H6779>forth<s%> <S%H3045>now.<s%> Don't you know <S%H7760>it?<s%> I will even make a <S%H1870>way<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H5104>rivers<s%> in the <S%H3452>desert.<s%>

The <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H3513>honor<s%> <S%H8577>me,<s%> the jackals and the <S%H1323>ostriches;<s%> because I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and <S%H5104>rivers<s%> in the <S%H3452>desert,<s%> to give <S%H8248>drink<s%> to my <S%H5971>people,<s%> my <S%H972>chosen,<s%>
<S%H2098>the<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> which I <S%H3335>formed<s%> for <S%H5608>myself,<s%> that they might set forth my <S%H8416>praise.<s%>
Yet you have not <S%H7121>called<s%> on <S%H3290>me,<s%> Jacob; but you have been <S%H3021>weary<s%> of <S%H3478>me,<s%> Israel.

You have not <S%H935>brought<s%> me of your <S%H7716>sheep<s%> for burnt <S%H5930>offerings;<s%> neither have you <S%H3513>honored<s%> me with your <S%H2077>sacrifices.<s%> I have not <S%H5647>burdened<s%> you with <S%H4503>offerings,<s%> nor <S%H3021>wearied<s%> you with <S%H3828>frankincense.<s%>

You have <S%H7069>bought<s%> me no sweet <S%H7070>cane<s%> with <S%H3701>money,<s%> nor have you <S%H7301>filled<s%> me with the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of your <S%H2077>sacrifices;<s%> but you have <S%H5647>burdened<s%> me with your <S%H2403>sins.<s%> You have <S%H3021>wearied<s%> me with your <S%H5771>iniquities.<s%>
<S%H4229>I,<s%> even I, am he who blots out your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> for my own <S%H2142>sake;<s%> and I will not remember your <S%H2403>sins.<s%>
Put me in <S%H2142>remembrance.<s%> Let us <S%H8199>plead<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%> Set <S%H5608>forth<s%> your <S%H6663>case,<s%> that you may be justified.
Your <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and your <S%H3887>teachers<s%> have transgressed against <S%H6586>me.<s%>

Therefore I will <S%H2490>profane<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> a <S%H2764>curse,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> an <S%H1421>insult.<s%>"
